title: Data Structures & Algorithms Fundamentals
summary: Master fundamental data structures and algorithms. Perfect for coding interviews and technical foundation.
description: Learn the building blocks of computer science: arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and basic algorithms. This foundation course prepares you for advanced problem-solving.
body:
Master the essential data structures and algorithms that power modern software.

Who This Course Is For
• Computer Science students
• Career changers entering tech
• Anyone preparing for technical interviews
• Developers wanting to strengthen fundamentals

What You'll Learn
• Master arrays, linked lists, and dynamic arrays
• Understand stacks, queues, and deques
• Implement trees and binary search trees
• Learn sorting algorithms (merge, quick, heap)
• Understand search algorithms and complexity analysis
• Practice problem-solving with real interview questions

Course Outline
Module 1: Data Structures Basics & Arrays
Module 2: Linked Lists & Advanced Linear Structures
Module 3: Stacks, Queues & Deques
Module 4: Trees & Binary Search Trees
Module 5: Sorting & Searching Algorithms
Module 6: Complexity Analysis & Optimization
ogDescription: Master essential data structures and algorithms for coding interviews and technical foundation

title: LeetCode & Interview Problem Solving
summary: Solve 200+ LeetCode problems with an expert. Master patterns and strategies used by FAANG engineers.
description: Deep dive into interview problem patterns. Learn to recognize problem types, apply optimal solutions, and communicate your thinking.
body:
Conquer technical interviews by mastering problem-solving patterns and strategies.

Who This Course Is For
• Software engineers preparing for FAANG interviews
• Career changers targeting top tech companies
• Developers wanting to improve algorithm skills
• Anyone seeking to ace coding interviews

What You'll Learn
• Recognize and master problem patterns (sliding window, two pointers, etc.)
• Solve 200+ LeetCode problems across difficulty levels
• Learn time and space complexity optimization
• Develop communication skills for interview scenarios
• Understand company-specific interview strategies
• Practice mock interviews with feedback

Course Outline
Module 1: Problem Recognition & Patterns
Module 2: Two Pointers & Sliding Window
Module 3: Trees & Graphs
Module 4: Dynamic Programming
Module 5: Strings & Arrays
Module 6: Mock Interviews & Feedback
prerequisites: Data Structures & Algorithms Fundamentals or equivalent
ogDescription: Master 200+ LeetCode problems and interview patterns used by FAANG engineers

title: System Design for Interviews
summary: Master system design interviews. Design scalable systems like YouTube, Uber, and Instagram.
description: Learn to design large-scale systems. Cover scalability, reliability, and optimization from first principles.
body:
Design production-grade systems at scale, just like senior engineers do.

Who This Course Is For
• Mid-level to senior engineers
• Tech leads and architects
• Anyone preparing for senior-level interviews
• Engineers wanting to think at scale

What You'll Learn
• Design YouTube, Netflix, Uber, Twitter from scratch
• Master scalability principles (sharding, caching, CDNs)
• Understand database design (SQL vs NoSQL)
• Learn load balancing and fault tolerance
• Design APIs and microservices
• Practice with real system design interview scenarios

Course Outline
Module 1: System Design Fundamentals
Module 2: Scalability & Performance
Module 3: Database Design
Module 4: Case Studies: URL Shortener, Chat System
Module 5: Case Studies: Social Media, Video Streaming
Module 6: Advanced Topics & Mock Interviews
prerequisites: Basic understanding of databases and networking
ogDescription: Master system design interviews by designing scalable systems like YouTube and Uber

title: Competitive Programming Masterclass
summary: Master competitive programming. Compete in contests and win prizes.
description: Learn advanced algorithms and problem-solving strategies used by top competitive programmers.
body:
Train like a competitive programmer and excel in coding contests.

Who This Course Is For
• Students interested in competitive programming
• Developers wanting advanced algorithm skills
• Contest participants looking to improve rankings
• Anyone seeking intellectual challenge

What You'll Learn
• Advanced algorithm techniques and optimizations
• Number theory, combinatorics, and mathematical algorithms
• Graph algorithms and their applications
• Time optimization and memory efficiency
• Contest strategies and time management
• Practice with real contest problems

Course Outline
Module 1: Advanced Data Structures
Module 2: Graph Algorithms
Module 3: Number Theory & Combinatorics
Module 4: Dynamic Programming Advanced
Module 5: Contest Strategies
Module 6: Live Contest Practice & Feedback
prerequisites: LeetCode & Interview Problem Solving or equivalent
ogDescription: Master advanced algorithms and compete in programming contests

title: Technical Writing Masterclass
summary: Master technical writing. Write clear documentation, blogs, and technical guides.
description: Learn to communicate complex technical concepts clearly for diverse audiences.
body:
Become a technical writer that engineers and non-technical stakeholders both understand.

Who This Course Is For
• Software engineers wanting to improve communication
• Developers starting technical blogs
• Product managers writing specifications
• Anyone needing to document technical work

What You'll Learn
• Master clear, concise technical writing
• Structure technical documentation effectively
• Write tutorials and how-to guides
• Create API documentation
• Master markdown, diagrams, and visual communication
• Edit and review technical content
• Build a professional portfolio

Course Outline
Module 1: Technical Writing Fundamentals
Module 2: Documentation Structure & Best Practices
Module 3: Tutorials, Guides & How-Tos
Module 4: API Documentation
Module 5: Blogging & Long-Form Technical Content
Module 6: Portfolio Building & Publication
ogDescription: Master technical writing to communicate complex concepts clearly

title: Content Writing & Copywriting for Tech
summary: Master content and copywriting for tech companies. Write engaging marketing and educational content.
description: Learn persuasive writing techniques that convert readers into customers or students.
body:
Craft compelling content that engages tech audiences and drives results.

Who This Course Is For
• Content creators and marketers
• Entrepreneurs launching products
• Tech professionals branching into content
• Anyone wanting to improve persuasive writing

What You'll Learn
• Master copywriting psychology and principles
• Write engaging blog posts and articles
• Create product descriptions that sell
• Master email marketing copy
• Understand SEO and content strategy
• Build personal brand through content
• Analyze and optimize content performance

Course Outline
Module 1: Copywriting Fundamentals
Module 2: Blog Posts & Long-Form Content
Module 3: Product Descriptions & Sales Copy
Module 4: Email Marketing & Campaigns
Module 5: Content Strategy & SEO
Module 6: Building Your Content Portfolio
prerequisites: Interest in marketing or content creation
ogDescription: Master persuasive content writing that engages tech audiences

title: Personal Branding & Storytelling
summary: Build your personal brand through authentic storytelling. Stand out in tech.
description: Learn to tell your unique story and build influence in your industry.
body:
Build a powerful personal brand that opens doors and creates opportunities.

Who This Course Is For
• Developers wanting to build influence
• Freelancers and consultants
• Career changers entering tech
• Anyone wanting to stand out professionally

What You'll Learn
• Discover and craft your unique story
• Master personal brand strategy
• Build authority through consistent content
• Leverage social media effectively
• Network authentically
• Create a personal website/portfolio
• Turn your brand into opportunities

Course Outline
Module 1: Personal Brand Fundamentals
Module 2: Your Unique Story & Value Proposition
Module 3: Content Strategy for Personal Branding
Module 4: Social Media & Networking
Module 5: Website, Portfolio & Public Presence
Module 6: Monetizing Your Brand & Authority
ogDescription: Build a powerful personal brand through authentic storytelling

title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
summary: Master UI/UX design principles. Create beautiful, user-centric interfaces.
description: Learn design thinking, user research, and wireframing to create exceptional user experiences.
body:
Design digital products that users love using design thinking and user-centered principles.

Who This Course Is For
• Developers interested in design
• Career changers entering UX
• Entrepreneurs designing products
• Anyone wanting to improve user experience

What You'll Learn
• Design thinking and problem-solving
• User research and persona creation
• Wireframing and prototyping
• Visual design principles
• Usability testing and iteration
• Figma fundamentals
• Designing for accessibility

Course Outline
Module 1: Design Thinking Fundamentals
Module 2: User Research & Personas
Module 3: Wireframing & Information Architecture
Module 4: Visual Design & Design Systems
Module 5: Prototyping in Figma
Module 6: Usability Testing & Iteration
ogDescription: Master UI/UX design principles to create user-centric interfaces

title: Web Design for Developers
summary: Learn web design without sacrificing functionality. Build beautiful websites developers love.
description: Combine technical skills with design principles to build stunning, performant websites.
body:
Build websites that are beautiful, functional, and performant using design and development best practices.

Who This Course Is For
• Frontend developers wanting design skills
• Full-stack developers
• Web developers building own projects
• Anyone designing for the web

What You'll Learn
• Web design layout and grid systems
• Typography and color theory for web
• Creating responsive designs
• Design systems and component libraries
• Accessibility in web design
• CSS-friendly design patterns
• Performance-conscious design

Course Outline
Module 1: Web Design Fundamentals
Module 2: Layout, Typography & Color
Module 3: Responsive Design Patterns
Module 4: Design Systems & Components
Module 5: Accessibility & Performance
Module 6: From Design to Code
ogDescription: Learn web design to build beautiful, functional websites

title: Graphic Design & Brand Identity
summary: Master graphic design and brand identity. Create logos, graphics, and cohesive visual systems.
description: Learn to design professional graphics and build strong visual identities for brands.
body:
Create cohesive visual identities and professional graphics that represent brands powerfully.

Who This Course Is For
• Entrepreneurs building personal/company brand
• Freelancers offering design services
• Developers wanting design fundamentals
• Creative professionals

What You'll Learn
• Logo design principles
• Color theory and palette creation
• Typography for branding
• Brand guidelines development
• Layout and composition
• Using Canva and design tools
• Building a design portfolio

Course Outline
Module 1: Design Principles & Elements
Module 2: Logo Design
Module 3: Color Theory & Palette Creation
Module 4: Typography for Branding
Module 5: Brand Guidelines
Module 6: Portfolio & Client Work
prerequisites: Access to Canva or Adobe Suite
ogDescription: Master graphic design to create professional brand identities
